thread.title: Daleema to contest in Local Body Elections
thread.title_full: Daleema to contest in Local Body Elections - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Daleema to contest in Local Body Elections
text:
Singer Daleema will be the LDF nominee for the elections to Aroor division of the district panchayat. The singer who has won the hearts of music lovers through many film songs and devotional songs has her desire to do social service as a reason to enter politics.
Her hits include 'Manjumaasa pakshi' in the film Krishnagudiyil oru pranayakalathu and devotional songs such as 'Nee ente prarthana kettu' and 'Vaazhthunnu daivame nin mahathvam .' She is a resident of Ezhupunna at Aroor.
